summary: I WAS STOPPED ON A BUSY MAIN ROAD IN MY TOWN, TO MAKE A LEFT INTO MY NEIGHBORHOOD AND MY JEEP CHEROKEE STALLED.  THE DASH LIT UP WITH PUT IN PARK AND RESTART CAR.  I PUT IT IN PARK AND THE CAR RESTARTED.  I DROVE TO MY HOUSE AND PARKED THE CAR.  I HAD TO USE MY OTHER CAR TO GO TO WORK BECAUSE I WAS AFRAID FOR MY SAFETY IF I DROVE MY JEEP CHEROKEE.
